### oracle 本地服务启动失败
#### 修改配件文件
#### 路径： E:\me2\oracle12c\product\12.2.0\dbhome_1\network\admin\listener.ora
```txt
# listener.ora Network Configuration File: E:\me2\oracle12c\product\12.2.0\dbhome_1\NETWORK\ADMIN\listener.ora
# Generated by Oracle configuration tools.

SID_LIST_LISTENER =
  (SID_LIST =
    (SID_DESC =
      (SID_NAME = CLRExtProc)
      (ORACLE_HOME = E:\me2\oracle12c\product\12.2.0\dbhome_1)
      (PROGRAM = extproc)
      (ENVS = "EXTPROC_DLLS=ONLY:E:\me2\oracle12c\product\12.2.0\dbhome_1\bin\oraclr12.dll")
    )
  )

LISTENER =
  (DESCRIPTION_LIST =
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = localhost)(PORT = 1521))
    )
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = IPC)(KEY = EXTPROC1521))
    )
    (DESCRIPTION =
      (ADDRESS = (PROTOCOL = TCP)(HOST = 192.168.1.XXXX)(PORT = 1521))
    )
  )

ADR_BASE_LISTENER = E:\me2\oracle12c\product\12.2.0\dbhome_1\log
```
#### 暂停服务并重新启动
